pageContext.claim: “And we think, ultimately, you'll have most countries join, and you're going to have the Palestinians in a very good position. They want to come in -- they're going to want to come in because all of their friends are in. But we have tremendous enthusiasm for coming into the deal.”
pageContext.analysis: The Palestinians have said Trump is not an honest broker and have refused to join the negotiations. After Trump announced the U.S. embassy would move to Jerusalem, Palestinian President Abbas announced he would cut ties with the United States. They have also denounced the "Abraham Accords" as a betrayal of the Palestinian cause.
